Description:
To be successful you will need to meet the following:Please note that due to Saudization, only Saudi Nationals can be considered for this role.
Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources or Business administration.
Minimum 10 years’ experience in different HR activities.
Must have manufacturing/factory experience. Pharmaceutical/ FMCG industry is a plus.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Applicants should be available for face-to-face interviews in the location mentioned above.Job Details
